original_text: Everything continues in the same way. There is nothing important to talk about. Nothing that we see is enough to make us happy. There are always more things that we want to hear. Everything continues in the same way. There is nothing important to talk about. Nothing that we see is enough to make us happy. There are always more things that we want to hear. Everything continues in the same way.
korean_text: 모든 만물이 피곤하다는 것을 사람이 말로 다 말할 수는 없나니 눈은 보아도 족함이 없고 귀는 들어도 가득 차지 아니하도다

sentences.original_text: Everything continues in the same way.
There is nothing important to talk about.
Nothing that we see is enough to make us happy.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 보는 것은 우리를 행복하게 만들기에 충분하지 않습니다.

sentences.original_text: There are always more things that we want to hear.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 듣고 싶어 하는 것은 항상 더 많이 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: Everything continues in the same way.
There is nothing important to talk about.
Nothing that we see is enough to make us happy.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 보는 것은 우리를 행복하게 만들기에 충분하지 않습니다.

sentences.original_text: There are always more things that we want to hear.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 듣고 싶어 하는 것은 항상 더 많이 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: Everything continues in the same way.
